function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited research in critical areas related to disease control and outbreak management","Impact":"Lack of understanding and preparedness for disease control in critical areas","Mitigation":"Increase funding and support for research in underexplored areas of disease control and outbreak management","Technologies":"Data analytics, AI, and computational modeling for identifying research gaps","People":"Researchers, public health organizations, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, funding agencies, government"},{"Description":"Inadequate knowledge and understanding of infection risk factors based on age, gender, and location of the population","Impact":"Increased vulnerability to disease outbreaks due to inadequate understanding of infection risk factors","Mitigation":"Conduct targeted research on infection risk factors based on age, gender, and location of the population","Technologies":"Epidemiological studies, data analytics, and geographic information systems (GIS)","People":"Epidemiologists, public health researchers, statisticians","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Limited research on drug efficacy, safety, and antibody response","Impact":"Risk of ineffective treatment and immunization strategies for disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Invest in research on drug efficacy, safety, and antibody response for improved treatment and immunization strategies","Technologies":"Clinical trials, immunological assays, and drug screening technologies","People":"Immunologists, pharmacologists, public health researchers","Owner":"Pharmaceutical companies, research institutions"}]}
